name: NSTabViewDelegate
desc: The NSTabViewDelegate protocol defines the optional methods implemented by delegates of NSTabView objects.

items.name: func tabViewDidChangeNumberOfTabViewItems(NSTabView)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the number of tab view items in tabView has changed.

items.name: func tabView(NSTabView, shouldSelect: NSTabViewItem?) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked just before tabViewItem in tabView is selected.

items.name: func tabView(NSTabView, willSelect: NSTabViewItem?)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that tabView is about to select tabViewItem.

items.name: func tabView(NSTabView, didSelect: NSTabViewItem?)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that tabView has selected tabViewItem.
